short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improves Bitbucket issues. CSS fixes and quick access to issues from list

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Issues List Page
- Adds icons to each issue on the issues table. Allowing to quickly view and edit the issue.
- Limits the 'title' column becoming too narrow.
- Grows the 'milestone' & 'version' column to accommodate for the longest milestone.
- Hides the 'votes' column.

New Issue Page
- Milestones with past dates in their names get moved to the end of the dropdown list
